attributes.action: Bring into effect legislation to limit the use of fireworks by private individuals to a one week period before and after 5th November and to limit the staging of public displays during the rest of the year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of fireworks has spread from November 5th to the extent that in many areas they are used on an almost weekly basis throughout the year.  Fireworks are dangerous and are a menace to people, pets and wildlife.  We call upon the Government and the Health and Safety executive to take the necessary steps to restrict the sale of fireworks to private individuals to the period immediately before November 5th and also to make it illegal for fireworks to be used by private individuals at any other time of the year.
